# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer - Construction Cost Specialist

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4001457350
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-12
* **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, August 17th, 2023, at 14:00 HAE (Prev. 14:00 HAE on August 25th 2023)

### Solicitation Details (English)

* **Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**: (#EN439-231851)
* **Procurement Category**: *SRV* (Services)
* **Trade Agreements**: For information regarding the trade agreements listed, see part A of the Solicitation Document.
* **Regions of Delivery**: *
  * Canada
  * Ontario (except NCR)
  * National Capital Region (NCR)
  * Quebec (except NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
  * **Name**: Marie-Ève Bouchard (SPAC/PSPC)
  * **Email**: [marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16503809?extsite=MTY1MDM4MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) requires Construction Cost Consultants to provide independent third-party cost planning, estimating, and peer reviews for various projects located within the National Capital Area (NCA), Ontario, and Quebec provinces.

Successful contractors must be able to provide integrated building information, construction services, and associated costs. Contractors shall have experience with PSPC standard documentation.

### Important Notes

*   Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
*   All required supporting documentation and offer submission must be submitted by the new deadline of Thursday, August 17th, 2023.
